fields.name: description
fields.value:
3 Tips for Prioritizing Mental Health During Your Days Off

Our days off hold immense potential to recharge and rejuvenate our mental well-being. Here are three simple yet effective tips to ensure you make the most of your downtime:

1. Mindful Moments: Start your day with a mindful practice. Even dedicating just a few minutes to deep breathing, meditation, or gentle stretching can set a peaceful tone for the day ahead. Mindfulness helps reduce stress and increases awareness of the present moment.

2. Digital Detox: Give your mind a break from screens and constant notifications. Designate specific hours during the day to disconnect from digital devices. Use this time to engage in activities you truly enjoy, like reading, cooking, or spending quality time with loved ones.

3. Purposeful Rest: While weekends can be a time to catch up on chores, remember that rest is equally important. Set boundaries for work-related tasks and create a balance between activity and relaxation. A well-rested mind is better equipped to handle challenges and stressors.

Prioritizing mental health on your days off doesn't have to be complicated. Small, intentional choices can make a big difference in how you feel. By incorporating mindful practices, embracing a digital detox, and allowing yourself meaningful rest, you'll be on your way to a more balanced and rejuvenating weekend. Your mental well-being deserves this investment of time and care.

• If you feel there is financial blockage in your relationship, then stop putting anyone on pedestal (when you pedestal anyone, you are putting everything onto that one person).

fields.value:
Life is very difficult with narcissistic person. It can be anyone like your boss, family member, husband, wife, friend, lover etc. 
Adopt seven ways to save yourself from Narcissistic abuse. 

🌸 Do not take any of their word seriously and stay calm as they cannot feel others feelings so they can speak anything to hurt you. 

🌸 Show them their boundaries with you repeatedly and firmly as they cross it again and again because by putting you low they feel high in themselves.

🌸 Be non dependent on them by every means because once they know that they are important for you then they will devalue you and get pleasure by making you cry. 

 🌸Drop the idea of changing them with your love because Narcissism is a personality disorder. They cannot love anyone as they cannot love themselves. They want all from you but they will either keep you starving or hardly give some bread crums to keep you hooked with them. 

🌸 Do not trust their false sob stories. Self victimization is a part of their harassment. 

🌸 Forgive them as they don't know what they are doing. They are in deep inner pain and to get soothing effect they harass others. Release yourself from this vicious cycle. 

🌸 Go for therapy and do Self development programs to built your Self esteem again. You need it truly and on priority basis. 

Take care
Acharrya Smredhi

fields.name: description
fields.value:
Best solution is when it comes from your own mind. This works in the best possible way, in our life. 
Therapy 🍁is a healthy and powerful medium to handle the various challenges of life, which we all come across from time to time. 
What you need in this?
Your willingness. That's it and It can open those doors in your mind which cannot be opened alone. 
Some common challenges in which therapy helps a lot: 

🍁 I am in loveless marriage and neither I can leave my partner nor I am able to live with him. 

🍁 I want to take this designation but don't know where I am stuck. How can I.

🍁 I want to reach to this position but my inner doubts, fears fail all my efforts and no matter what i do I can't get rid of them. 

🍁 I am having very low Self esteem. I want to progress but I am scared of moving ahead. 

🍁 He cheated on me. I am sinking in this heart break. 

🍁 After divorce also I am not able to forget that abuse and not able restart my life. 

🍁 I  having exam fear. Not able to gain confidence. Can I get my Self confidence

🍁 She creates lot of fights in the house but I can't leave. How to live in this. 

🍁 She rejected me. I am not able to take this pain. 

🍁 I do lot of emotional junk food eating

🍁 I cannot forgive him, but this is so heavy on my mind. 

🍁 I cannot forget that, but now how to live with this. 

🍁 I am very angry on him, but all my work is suffering. 

🍁 That instance broke me. I am not able to walk in life. 

These are common challenges, faced by majority of people but they run outside to every door to find the solution but don't think therapy can help them wonderfully in this because of lack of awareness. 
Times have changed, so the challenges and so the solutions. 

Try therapy.  Healthy way to live Healthy life. 

Acharrya Smredhi
(Mental wellness Practitioner) 

#therapysessions #traumahealing #counsellingservices #personalgrowth #lifecoaching #relationshipcounselling #acharryasmredhi #peacefulme

fields.name: description
fields.value:
Family " neither you want to stay with them nor you can leave them" 

Do you feel this ? 

This is that segment of life which makes us feel overwhelmed, helpless, irritated at the same time gives comfort, belongingness, identity & protection. So what to do with family such that it makes things happier, more harmonious in our lives & yet maintain healthy distances? How to strike a right balance of give & take. 

Well answer lies in healing our family wounds. The unexpressed trauma no matter who faced always remains in family grid & untill it's healed. Whether it's death of a family member or any kind of huge financial loss to your ancestors or some abortions in family or some member was thrown out of family. Everyone shares the heaviness of any kind of family issues. These emotions float in the morphogenic energetic field of family & until released it would keep creating blockages.

Do you know if we lack good bond with mother we subconsciously never be able to feel successful likewise if bonds with father are not great, we would financially never feel secure. Such equations dictate our subconscious mind & no matter who much hardwork you do to crack that job/promotion/deal these energies would keep dictating your life.

fields.name: description
fields.value:
At the end, our lives our just stories📜. Stories which will disappear in next few decades in the realm of time. 

Stories which are wooven with the feelings and emotions of loving, crashing, gathering, achieving, dancing, laughter, tears, dissolving and still breathing 💕 

Is the experience of human emotions and feelings soooo beautiful 🪷, that our soul took human form to experience this, which was not possible for it to experience in energy form. 

And now when we are living this story, when it is in the present moment then is the the hero of the story fully participating in it. 

🌸 Are we living it fully. 
🌸 Is our soul tasting every emotion and feeling  that when we return there is no regret. 
🌸 Is this story beautiful in our eyes. 

Acharrya Smredhi
